title: Metaverse-Based Mathematical Inquiry: Informal Learning Design for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and basic proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Informal learning environment where medical/legal/technical professionals explore work-related mathematical concepts in a metaverse setting

learning_goals: Enhancing spatial understanding by explaining complex mathematical concepts using 3D visualization tools in a metaverse platform (3+ methods).
Strengthening teamwork competencies by performing real-time problem-solving activities with peer learners in a virtual reality-based collaborative space (5+ sessions).
Enabling self-directed learning pattern analysis by uploading learning records to an edtech platform (80%+ completion rate).

resources: Metaverse Platform (Gather Town/Enter the Bird, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
